HeroSection.Title: Hwetša thušo ya motheo le menyetla ya setšhaba
HeroSection.Subtitle: Sebuletša dikhutlo tša setšhaba tša kgetho ya gago.
HeroSection.SupportSubtitle: Mmuso wa legaeng, mekhatlo ya basha, le dikhamphani.

Blogs.LatestNews: Ditaba tša moraorao mabapi le tlhahlo ya mesomo
Blogs.Insight: Dumela tlaleletšo go kaonafatša kgolo ya mosomo le dikeletšo

Footer.Address: 143 West Street, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, Afrika Borwa

Jobs.Title: Hlahloba menyetla ya mesomo ya bjale
Jobs.Subtitle: Fumana mesomo go ya ka boiphihlelo bja gago le dikgetho
Jobs.SearchPlaceholder: Nyaka Setulo sa Mošomo goba Khamphani

FAQs.Title: Dipotšišo tse di Bodiwaganye
FAQs.Subtitle: Ge eba dipotšišo tsa gago ga di arabja fa, o kgopela go ikopanya le lefapha la tshegetso bakeng sa thúšo.
FAQs.LoadError: Go paletše go laela dipotšišo. Ka kopo leka gape ka moragonyana.

Events.EventsInfo: Dintlha tše fano go tswa dikhamphani le mekhatlo ya setšhaba.

PrivacyPolicy.Title: Leano la Boipshino
PrivacyPolicy.Intro: Re šireletša boipshino bja gago. Bona kamoo re šomago ka ditaba tša gago:
PrivacyPolicy.DataCollection: 1. Pokello ya Dintlha: Re kgoboketša seo o fanago ka sona le tshebediso ya tšhomi.
PrivacyPolicy.Usage: 2. Tšhomišo: Re šomiša tshedimošo ya gago go kaonafatša ditirelo.
PrivacyPolicy.Security: 3. Polokeho: Re tšea dikgato go šireletša tshedimošo.
PrivacyPolicy.ThirdParties: 4. Batho ba Kantle: Ga re abelane tshedimošo ya gago ntle le tumelelo.
PrivacyPolicy.Updates: 5. Dihlogo: Re ka fetola leano. Tšhomišo e tswelapele e bolela kamohelo.
PrivacyPolicy.Contact: Ikopanye le rena go info@sisonke.co.za bakeng sa dipotso

Subscribe.Title: Ingwadiše go hwetša ditaba tša rena
Subscribe.Description: Bolela ka mesomo ye meswa, dintlha, le dikhutlo tša setšhaba go dikanegelo tša setšhaba le dikgopolo.
Subscribe.SuccessMessage: Ngwadišo e atlegile! Kea leboga ka ngwadišo ya gago.
Subscribe.ErrorOccurred: Go bile le phošo. Leka gape.

Services.Title: Seo o ka se fihlelelago mo setšhabeng sa rena
Services.Subtitle: Gabotse ka thušo, menyetla le kgokagano
Services.CommunityDescription: Kgokaganya le batho ba go tshwana le wena mo setšhabeng, abelana ditokelo, le go duleng o tseba.
Services.EventsDescription: Le ka se hlokomologe dintlha tša setšhaba le menyetla ya go kgokagana le batho.
Services.JobsDescription: Mekgatlo ya rena e go thusa go hwetša mesomo, go ithuta ka dithuto le go hloma bokgoni.
Services.CommunicationDescription: Re abelana dikgopolo ka di-blog le foramo tša setšhaba, go go kgokaganya le batho.

Hero.GetInTouch: Ikopanye le rena bakeng sa tshedimosetso
Hero.HelpMessage: Ha o hloka thuso kapa o na le potso, re mona ho wena

ContactPage.FormInstruction: Tlhalosa ka polelo ebile sehlopha sa rona se tla go araba ka hare ga diiri tša 24.
ContactPage.ShortMessage: Molaetsa o swanetše go ba bonyane ka ditlhaka tše 10
ContactPage.Name: Leina
ContactPage.Subject: Hlogo ya Tsebo

hero.title: Ka Rona
hero.subtitle: Mo Sisonke, re ikgantšha ka boikgethelo bja rena go matlafatsa setšhaba, kgokagano, le kgolo mo metseng ya Afrika Borwa.

AboutUs.WhoWeAreDescription: Sisonke ke setšhaba sa batho sa go kgokaganya dithuto, menyetla le batho mo ditoropong tša Afrika Borwa.
AboutUs.WhatWeDoDescription: Re fana ka tshomelo ya dijithale ya go hwetša mešomo, dintlha, le kgwebo ya setšhaba.
AboutUs.HowWeHelpDescription: Re diragatša kgokagano, re abelana tsebo, le go hloma menyetla ya go kaonafatša batho.
AboutUs.CreateSuccessStoriesDescription: Ka kgokagano ya setšhaba, dikgwebo, le dithuto, re thuša batho go fihlelela ditoro tša bona.

job.findJob: Fumana mošomo go ya ka kgetho ya gago
